location: Farm power system area (inverter), MaMeeFarm, Thailand
title: inverter_system_power_off_time
summary: Recorded the inverter system power-off time for the farm energy system.
description: This record documents the time the farm inverter system was powered off. Power availability was not continuous for 24 hours due to real energy limitations; however, the overall system operations remained ongoing under constraints.
